llm_res.rule: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.

The `safeTransferFrom` function must check if `_to` is a smart contract and if so, it must call `onERC721Received` on `_to` and throw if the return value is not `bytes4(keccak256("onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)"))`.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.
